lead_paragraph: Officials announced a halt in financial support over a political crisis that has claimed hundreds of lives, but said humanitarian aid would continue.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Burundi: Citing Crisis, Europe Cuts Aid
headline.main: European Union Suspends Aid to Burundi Over Political Crisis

snippet: Officials announced a halt in financial support over a political crisis that has claimed hundreds of lives, but said humanitarian aid would continue.
abstract: European Union suspends aid to Burundi's government, citing political crisis prompted by Pres Pierre Nkurunziza that has led to over 400 deaths and forced more than 240,000 people to leave country.
